com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.ui

Class SproutAdd

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.ui.SproutAdd
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Snapshot

    public final class SproutAdd
extends Object
implements Snapshot
    This Snapshot represents the game board after a Move is drawn, indicating that a sprout can be added anywhere on the Move.

    A "touch up" event detects the position of a new sprout and adds it to the last drawn Move.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • SproutAdd

        public SproutAdd(SproutsGameState currentState,
                 Move move,
                 float moveThickness,
                 int circleSegmentCount,
                 Rectangle gameBounds,
                 CobwebSwitch displayCobweb)
        Creates a new SproutAdd Snapshot from the currentState, move.
        Parameters:
        currentState - the graph that a Move is being drawn to
        move - the move to place the middle sprout on
        moveThickness - the thickness of the Moves drawn
        circleSegmentCount - the number of segments used to draw circular Vertices
        gameBounds - any Submove that is drawn outside of gameBounds is invalid
        displayCobweb - a switch that tracks whether the player wishes to display cobweb
